analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#136) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#235-270)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#349-372)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#442-457)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#461-480)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#542-546) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#283-300):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#298-299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#299)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#573-585) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#584)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#510) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#551-554)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#542-546)
	- /unique_chucks/41/0xd6a5839f4b10296a0ec801b7826b7d28e781472a.sol#545-546
